name: leetcode-deployment-root
description: Deployment scripts to target frontend sub-project.

scripts.build:leetcode: cd frontend && npm run build -- --configuration production
scripts.deploy:leetcode: npm run build:leetcode && firebase deploy --only hosting:leetcode-techthordev-app
scripts.docs:build: compodoc -c compodoc.json -p tsconfig.json -d compodoc-leetcode-build --name "LeetCode Project API Docs"
